channel.title: Explanation
channel.description: Why are numerious topics in the TuT section getting locked/deleted honestly this is bull... And i think that other people want to know why also...

item.title: Explanation
item.dc:creator: @trytohaxme2 trytohaxme2
item.description:
@trytohaxme2 wrote:

The reason they are getting locked is obvious.
They are posting useless topics including Copy & Paste, C&P are not allowed.
They are also no 5 min or less tuts allowed, you have to teach someone not spoon feed it!

Read full topic
